member.name: EMRFRAMERGN
member.summary: The EMRFRAMERGN structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRFRAMERGN.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRFRAMERGN.cbRgnData
member.summary: Size of region data, in bytes.

member.name: EMRFRAMERGN.ihBrush
member.summary: Index of brush, in handle table.

member.name: EMRFRAMERGN.szlStroke
member.summary: Width and height of region frame, in logical units.
